title: Spiekermann reloaded

Hello fellow typophiles..  
I have been a regular lurker on this site & have always enjoyed the lively debate & discussions; thanks for all the infos & news...  
With the release of the mentioned video; I thought this could be a good occassion to finally come out of the bushes & present myself...  
I hope you are enjoying the video & song; must say a great thanks to my friend Mike Croft for coming up with the music; atleast it gave us a good laugh making it...  
Your comments on the fonts are very true; I had a bit of a hard time getting hold of the right fonts for each style & being on zero budget; I used alot of my own fonts designs... True that Hobo for the french was not ideal but I just could not get hold of a good version of the Metro font used in the original Tyopmania clip...  
Feel free to give us some feedback & critics!

Michael, you probably didn’t realize how appropriate that typeface actually is. Erik often greets me and other guys in the office with a “hey, big boy” when he comes to visit San Francisco. Not in the melodramatic girly tone most Americans use it but more like a matter-of-fact father: “how are things, son?” It’s quite amusing.
Hi Stephen; thanks for that note; indeed that is a funny coincidence:)
